page.title: 15GAMES WE PLAY IN SETTLE (1)
page.content: {SLAM:}To play slam you need a football and you choose a wall.You kick the ball against the wall and when it comes back to you,you kick it to the next person.If you want you can throw the ball instead and the other person catches it and throws it.When the ball stays near the wall, you have to kick it.{MONKEY:}To play Monkey you get a ball and throw it to the next person. If they catch it,they say a letter.The first one to say all the letters in the word "MONKEY" can choose the next game to play.{SCARECROW TIG:}You need quite a few people for scarecrow tig. We use a plank as 'den'.If you are tug,you have to stand like a scarecrow until someone else tigs you,then you are free and you can stand on the plank so the person who's on can't tig you again.
